definitions.title: n.f
definitions.body: direction, counsel (prob. orig. of rope- pulling, i.e. steering, directing a ship, v. [[חׂבֵּל]], so Thes; v. De Pr 1:5);—only pl. and only WisdLt. [[תַּחְבֻּלוֹת]] abs. Pr 1:5 + 3 t.; cstr. Pr 12:5; sf. [[תַּחבּוּלֽת֠ו]] Job 37:12—direction, guidance (i.e. by God) Job 37:12 (of thunder cloud); counsels of wicked ([[רשׁעים]]) Pr 12:5 (opp. [[מַחְשְׁבוֹת חדיקים]]); gen. good, wise counsels Pr 1:5; Pr 11:14 (‖[[רׂב יועֵץ]]), Pr 24:6 (‖ id.); Pr 20:18 (‖[[עֵחָה]]).
